definition: At the Crossroads, famous opera, based on a story from 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4]
surname San
three/3
fork in road/bifurcation/branch in road, river, mountain range etc/to branch off/to turn off/to diverge/to stray (from the path)/to change the subject/to interrupt/to stagger (times)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Interrogating Hong Niang is a typical civil play, while this Crossroads belongs to military play.
sentences.chinese: 《拷红》是典型的文戏，而《三岔口》属于武戏。

sentences.english: The play features scenes of hand-to-hand fighting between two actors wearing jacket and trousers.
sentences.chinese: 《三岔口》这出戏主要由两个演员进行短打表演。
